title: Sofia Richie goes out in Malibu after 'insensitive' wildfire comment
text:
She caught some heat on Monday evening for her 'insensitive' Instagram post about the tragic California Wildfires that are currently burning.

But the comments didn't appear to faze Sofia Richie who was spotted enjoying a dinner date at Nobu in Malibu, which is about 10 miles from the fires.

The 21-year-old showcased her chic casual style as she was pictured leaving the restaurant solo with a doggie bag.

Night out: Sofia Richie showcased her chic and casual style on Monday evening as she was spotted stepping out at Nobu, Malibu, for a dinner date

Sofia rocked an oversized white T-shirt that was of a box-fit design underneath a black blazer.

She teamed the look with yellow snakeskin inspired straight legged trousers that reached her mid-waist.

The daughter of Lionel Richie completed her ensemble with black patent leather peep-toe heels that had a gold heel.

Casual look: The model walked out of the eatery with her blonde hair out naturally and she appeared to be wearing a minimal amount of makeup

Too far? Earlier in the afternoon, the beauty took to her social media account to share a photo of her ensemble but received backlash for her 'insensitive' comment about the current wildfires

Sofia walked out of the eatery with her blonde hair out naturally and she appeared to be wearing a minimal amount of makeup.

Earlier in the afternoon, the beauty took to her social media account to share a photo of her ensemble.

'Santa Ana winds - messy bun,' she captioned.

Not impressed: Another took to Twitter to pen: 'Sofia Richie talking about how the Santa Anas are great for her hair might be the most tone-deaf things I've ever seen!!!'

And while most of her fans left supportive and gushing comments, others found her caption 'insensitive' to the Getty fires that are currently taking place.

'200,000 people evacuated and 2 million people without power but okay go ahead flex?? could u be any more insensitive,' commented one.

Another took to Twitter to pen: 'Sofia Richie talking about how the Santa Anas are great for her hair might be the most tone-deaf things I've ever seen!!!'

Sofia is yet to respond.
